title: Unable to remove spurious spec from spack DB
body:
I can't uninstall any python package due to a previous installation of the ```py-imageio``` package.

For example, if I try to uninstall a python package I get the following : 
```
[sajid@xrmlite spack]$ spack uninstall --dependents qhull%intel                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                            
==> The following packages will be uninstalled:                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                            
-- linux-centos7-x86_64 / intel@18.0.3 --------------------------                                                                                                                           
henl6yu py-matplotlib@2.2.2%intel~animation+image+ipython~latex~qt+tk                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                            
qkrp6ba qhull@2015.2%intel build_type=RelWithDebInfo patches=10ddc62a1600b0ede23fb0502e29dca389d18689fd8dfe7a849e3a989c0e607e                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                            
==> Do you want to proceed? [y/N] y                                                                                                                                                         
==> Error: Spec mfndl3jhvdmmxv7lvheusdti7fg7refa not found in /home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-18.0.3/py-imageio-2.3.0-mfndl3jhvdmmxv7lvheusdti7fg7refa      
```
I've tried ```spack clean -a```, ```spack reindex``` and ```spack module refresh``` and nothing solves the issue.

The directory spack is looking for is for a previous install of imageio which doesn't exist. Is there some way to forcibly purge it from the DB ? I've tried to find a module file corresponding to imageio and there isn't one.
